transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji kaun?
Customer: Hi, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan, aapki abhi Manish Rajawat se baat hui na services ko leke?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay, haan aapne unko feedback diya hai, ek unka feedback aaya hai that aap not satisfied hai. Batayenge kya aap?
Customer: Haan, haan, main Manish se unse pehle bhi jo mam thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Unhe bhi same feedback hi diya tha, iske liye unhe hataya gaya tha. Hamare management se. Uska concern ye tha ki main something kafi baar baat kar chuka hu and jo Google Meet vagera ka wo bolte hain, jo bhi manager hote hain. Unse bhi kafi baar Google Meet vagera mein sab kiye. Na to abhi tak hamare products ka kuch bhi fix hua hai. Aur neither notification bhi jo humne bola tha sabse bada concern, wo main shuru se hi abhi tak koi notification nahi diya jata jab bhi buylead upload hoti hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Haan, to ye dono hi concern main the. Kyunki abhi Manish se jo meri baat hui thi, unhone sabse pehle highlight vahi kiya tha ki ek jo hamare account pe previous lead padi hui hai jo ki humne purchase buy nahi ki thi. Content services ko leke, content writing ko.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Jo ki mera hai hi nahi. Mere criteria hi mein nahi hai wo. Maine to research paper, articles and thesis dissertation in sab ka tha.
Executive: Achha, haan, vahi kuch din pehle mujhse discussion hua tha Manish ka same cheez ke liye. To maine check kiya tha ki aapka na vaha pe aa raha tha ki aap thesis vagera likhte hain, I think yahi hai? Thesis likhte hain aap?
Customer: Ji, ji. Bilkul.
Executive: Okay. To jo leads aapki screen pe aati hain, aap unko not relevant mark kar sakte hain jo aapke kaam ki nahi hoti hain.
Customer: Main not relevant to mark kar dunga usme koi issue nahi hai. But kafi ye bhi hota hai na ki something jaise humne maan lo current mein purchase kiya ho, abhi do teen din ke andar wo issue aa raha ho to mujhe samajh mein aata hai. Wo continuously teen mahine se wo issue aa raha hai. Aur pehle aap agar history mein jayenge to pehle humne jaisa bataya gaya tha ki isko aap aisa left swipe karenge to automatic usme ho jata hai, hat jata hai wo not relevant mein ho jata hai left swipe karne pe. And right swipe karne pe shortlist mein aata hai wo.
Executive: Hide, hide pe click, ab usme hide ka option hota hai, hide click karne pe.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Okay, so basically aapko concern ye hai ki aapko jo leads, buyleads screen pe dikh rahi hain wo not relevant hain, aapke product se related nahi hai, right?
Customer: Ji, bilkul.
Executive: Okay. To dekhiye, ab ye ho sakta hai ki main kal aapse ek baar connect kar lu, hum log ek Google Meet pe connect kar lete hain, hum log discussion kar lete hain actually problem hai kahan pe. Category mapping correct hai ya nahi hai, agar correct nahi hai to usko correct kar lete hain.
Customer: Haan mam category mapping mein aisa hai jaise ki abhi kuch hi din pehle to Google Meet kiya tha humne.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: To us usme sir ne main cheez jo ne hi kisi se baat karwai thi unke senior se.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Unhone fir aur category mapping kiya tha dobara sari cheeze add ki thi and notification bhi unhone chalu karaya tha sara sara sab kuch.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: And same issue fir se. Kuch bhi matlab us time pe bhi kuch bhi sahi nahi hua tha. Maine turant Manish ko ek din baad call karke bataya bhi tha ke notification mein kuch bhi sahi nahi hua hai. Neither mujhe koi bhi lead se jo hum kar rahe hain wo koi kaam ke aa rahe hain aisa.
Executive: Okay. To basically jo feedback aap dete hain na hume, jo employee ko aap feedback dete hain, jo Manish ko feedback aaya hai, wo Manish ke services pe hai ki Manish aapke sath kaise coordinate karte hain, theek hai? To wo jo feedback jata hai na wo interaction hota hai ki aapke account manager ke sath aapka interaction kaisa rahiya raha hai, uska feedback dijiye, okay? Wo feedback separate hota hai service feedback se, theek hai? Wo aapke account manager ka feedback hota hai.
Customer: Aur call aa raha hai kya main aap hold kar sakte hain do second ke liye?
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain aap?
Customer: Aap do second ke liye hold kar sakte hain ye call aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan sure of course, haan haan bilkul.
(silence)
Automated Voice: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, un
Customer: Ya.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello mam.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, aap hi ki side pe call kiya gaya dobara bhi. Wo bhi sir line pe hi hai.
Executive: Haan ruk jaao main sir se bol raha hu.
Customer: Baat karo baat karo sir se main sun raha hu.
Executive: Haan mam.
Executive: Okay. Haan nahi sir bata rahe the ki unko jo leads aati hain na wo irrelevant leads aati hain. Wo jis product mein deal nahi karte.
Customer: Haan to wo irrelevant hai. To maine bola hai sir ko ki ek baar maine approach kiya hai ki aap video meet pe aaiye kal hum category mapping uski ek baar correct kar lete hain. If usme kuch galat hai to uske basis pe fir hum discussion kar sakte hain aage.
Customer: Theek hai video meeting arrange kar lo sir. Sir kitne baje ka time rahega aapka?
Customer: Sir main 2 baje something free rehta hu agar aap chahe to us time pe hum kar sakte hain.
Executive: Hmm hmm. 2 baje ka. Sir dekhiye maine aapko calendar video meeting ka invite bhej diya kal ke date ke liye, theek hai? So that ki aap apna calendar book kar le sir. Maine apna calendar book kar diya aapke sath meeting karne ke liye. Main bhi available rahunga uske andar main karunga apne. Sir mera maine aapko meeting link bhej di hai mere paas. Mera ek aur concern hai theek hai? Mujhe Manish ne bataya ki jo upgrade jo rehte hain na jaise ki upgrade purchase hote hain na ki humne agar hum apna subscription upgrade karein. Voice aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Executive: Upgrade tak bol rahe hain.
Customer: Haan haan upgrade upgrade upgrade like abhi jo hamara 30k wala hai. Sir ji haan sir benefits hoti hain sir. Haan. To sir main ye janna chahta hu agar hume upgrade ke baad hi sare benefits milne wale the to hume jaise ki sales team ne aapke liye pitch kiya tha hume ye wala offer. Sir why he pitched us that offer instead of the upgrade version?
Executive: Sir basic haan theek hai sir. That IndiaMART na. Sir we always for the first time client there is a pattern that has to be created right then the services that has to be. Aap jo amount de rahe ho right agar aap ek bada amount pay karte ho higher services lete ho you will be expecting a ROI from the amount aapka invested jyada rehta hai. Yaha pe kya hota hai sir aap yaha pe abhi kaam dekhte ho lead samajhte ho services samajhte ho usme kya hai kya nahi hai isiliye sir hum aapko basic setup se aapka because that will help you to create your performa yaha pe. Aapka buyer base banane ke liye.
Customer: But sir according to a new isko jab aap samajh jate hain cheezon ko sir. Haan ji ji bataye. Sorry. Agar new customer hota hai sir uske according jaise ki 30k ka maan liya aapka 30k ka hai but at least usko jo aap usne 30k invest kiya utna to usko return hona chahiye na. Nahi? Sir. Sir agar hum sir agar hum utna hi dene lage na sir agar hum utna hi dene lage to IndiaMART ka operation hi nahi jayega sir. Sir there is the thing I want to hear. There is the thing I want to hear. Because mere ko aisa lag raha hai sir ki jo maine invest kiya hai jo mera 30k already which I have already maine usko invest karke usi 30k ke liye dobara kaam kar raha hu. Like maine khud ka paisa khud ko kisi ko deke usi ke liye main kaam kar raha hu. It's like that. Sir isme matlab sahi bol rahe hain sir aap bilkul. Haan. Theek hai sir please iska jo bhi hai aap karaiye aap nahi rahega sir. Nahi nahi sir main us cheez ke liye keh raha hu sir kal aapka sara problem sab kuch jo hai na haan haan bataye. Sure sure sir kal kal apan ek baar baat kar lenge koi issue nahi hai okay sir. Aap kal ek dam detail mein aapka lead ka bhi feedback and jo bhi hai aap kaise follow kar rahe hain kya hai sara cheez ek ek karke baat karenge sir. Har ek lead pe aati inquiry pe bhi baat kar lenge aapke liye. Kis tarah se kya conversion ho sakta hai kya bacha kar sakte hain. Sab kuch ek ek discussion point pe karenge theek hai sir. But sir kindly is baar resolution provide karaiye. Pichli baar bahut baar se frustrated ho chuka hu main isliye main bol raha hu. Pichli baar bhi kafi logo se baat kar chuka hu kehte hain lead kar lo apan sahi kar denge lead kar lo apan sahi kar denge. But resolution kuch bhi nahi aata ab tak zero bataunga main isliye main no satisfied main isiliye karta hu har baar jab bhi feedback ke liye aata hai. Ki main satisfy hi nahi hu kyu karunga satisfy. Theek hai sir ek baar jaise aapne bola na isko finally resolve kariye kal baith ke isko resolve karte hain isko sir. Ji ji sure sure thank thank you sir. What's your good name? Thank you. Sir mera naam hai Sanjeev Pathak. Okay sir thank you. Okay thank you thank you. Okay theek hai sir kal connect karte hain. Thank you.
Customer: Thank you thank you thank you.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Irrelevant buyleads, not related to products.

- No notifications when buyleads are uploaded.

- No resolution despite previous discussions and Google Meets.

- Feels like reinvesting for the same returns.



Resolution:

- Executive scheduled a Google Meet for category mapping.

- Will discuss lead feedback and follow-up strategies.



Next Steps: 

- Google Meet scheduled for the next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category mapping, google meet, resolution
